landing.heroSubtitle: High-quality clothing designed for those seeking elegance, comfort, and a unique style that defines them.
landing.aboutText1: Monttreal was born from a passion for creating clothing that combines timeless elegance with exceptional comfort. Since our founding, we have been committed to offering garments that not only look good but also make you feel extraordinary.
landing.aboutText2: Each piece in our collection is carefully designed and crafted with the highest quality standards. We believe in conscious fashion and creating garments that stand the test of time.
landing.valuesSubtitle: What sets us apart and guides every decision we make
landing.value1Desc: Committed to responsible practices and eco-friendly materials that respect our planet.
landing.value2Desc: Unique creations that merge the latest trends with a distinctive and timeless style.
landing.value3Desc: Your satisfaction is our priority. Every detail is designed to provide you the best experience.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Explore our complete collection and find the perfect pieces for you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: At Monttreal, we collect information you provide directly when you create an account, make a purchase, or communicate with us. This information may include your name, email address, shipping address, phone number, and payment information.
privacy.section2Text: We use the collected information to:
privacy.section2Item2: Send you order confirmations and shipping updates
privacy.section2Item3: Respond to your inquiries and customer service requests
privacy.section2Item4: Send you marketing communications (if you have given consent)
privacy.section3Text: We implement security measures designed to protect your personal information, including:
privacy.section4Text: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except to trusted service providers who help us operate our website and manage our business, provided that these parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy.section5Text: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this may affect some site functionalities.
privacy.section6Text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:
